metadata.title: CVE-2017-7203 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) was discovered in ZoneMinder before 1.30.2.The vulnerability exists due to insufficient filtration of user-supplieddata (postLoginQuery) passed to the"ZoneMinder-master/web/skins/classic/views/js/postlogin.js.php" URL. Anattacker could execute arbitrary HTML and script code in a browser in thecontext of the vulnerable website.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7203` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.30.4+dfsg1-5
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30.4+dfsg1-5').
